briefTitle: A Study of of Glecaprevir/Pibrentasvir in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Genotype 5 or 6 Infection
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Glecaprevir (GLE)/Pibrentasvir (PIB) in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Genotype 5 or 6 Infection
summary: A Phase 3b, open-label, multicenter study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of glecaprevir/pibrentasvir for an 8- or 12-week treatment duration in participants with chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype (GT) 5 or 6 infection, with or without compensated cirrhosis respectively.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post Treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after last dose of study drug (week 20 or 24 depending on the treatment regimen)
